:py:mod:`skpm.base`
===================

.. py:module:: skpm.base


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   skpm.base.BaseProcessEstimator




.. py:class:: BaseProcessEstimator


   Bases: :py:obj:`sklearn.base.BaseEstimator`

   Base class for all process estimators in skpm.

   This class implements a common interface for all process,
   aiming at standardizing the validation and transformation
   of event logs.

   For instance, all event logs must have a `case_id` column.

   .. py:method:: _validate_log(X: pandas.DataFrame, y: pandas.DataFrame = None, reset: bool = True, cast_to_ndarray: bool = False, copy: bool = True)


   .. py:method:: _ensure_case_id(columns: list[str])
